definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: (? du. (cf. Kt 2Ki 14:2) or f.pl. pf [[יהועדה]], ([[עדה]] as noun) Aram. form; Klo 2Ki 14:2 cf. [[עַד־אָנׇה יהוה]] Ps 13:2; comp. Bab. n.pr. Aḫulapia, v. [[אַחְלָָי]] p. 29 supr.) mother of Amaziah, king of Judah 2Ki 14:2 Qr (Kt [[יהועדין]], LXX )Iwadeim, A )Iwadein), 2Ch 25:1 (LXX )Iwanaa, A )Iwaden, LXXL )Iwadein).
